txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Flames erupt from the south wing of The Prancing Pony as another brigand sets it to the torch</rgb>
'No! My poor wolf....'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Willie Hawthorn has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The Old Hunter has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Ufglup has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'Thank goodness you have come! The time is short, and our need is dire.'
'You have fought a great battle here today and done well. All of Bree owes you a debt.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The first assault has been defeated. You have a few moments to rest</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Blackfeather has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The second assault has been defeated. You have a few short moments to rest</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Snarling comes from the inner courtyard to the east</rgb>
'Here they come again!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The third assault has been defeated. Goilag now enters</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Goilag has been defeated. Bree is safe</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A voice booms from the west, 'If they will not starve they will burn!'</rgb>
'We have dared to stand against our captors, and now they are angry. The women and children are inside The Prancing Pony.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Heathstraw has fallen.</rgb>
'The brigands will come with torches and try to burn us out. The Pony can handle a few, but not more than five.'
<rgb=#FF0000>The fires within The Prancing Pony have consumed it.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Hissing comes from the west</rgb>
'If you see a torch-bearer, he must be immediately dispatched, without delay. Now, prepare yourself, they come.'
The women and children of Bree have barricaded themselves within The Prancing Pony Inn. The brigands and ruffians who took the town over are seeking to punish those who stand against them.
'Let us finish this! We will be free once more! For the Free Peoples! For Bree!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Rat-catcher has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A voice yells out from the south-west, 'Bree is ours!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A voice calls out from within The Prancing Pony, 'We're starving! Quickly, gather up that bread!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A cackling comes from the south, 'You will all burn!'</rgb>
'A torch-bearer! Quickly, do not allow him to reach The Prancing Pony!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A crazed yell comes from the south, 'If the Pony won't burn, the barn will!'</rgb>
Listen to Heathstraw's plan
<rgb=#FF0000>The horn sounds as the enemy returns!</rgb>
Talk to Second-watcher Heathstraw
Defeat the first assault
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Mukghashan has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Defeat the second assault
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A cawing screech comes from the south</rgb>
Defeat the third assault
Defeat Goilag
Heathstraw must survive the battle
The Prancing Pony must survive the battle
'A great victory for Bree!'
'Burn The Prancing Pony to the ground!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A brigand with a torch is heading for The Prancing Pony</rgb>
Second-watcher Heathstraw is eager to discuss the plan over how to protect The Prancing Pony with you in the moments before the assault.
First Assault
The first assault has begun. The Prancing Pony, and those within, must be protected all costs.
Second Assault
The first assault has been defeated, but the enemy is not broken. The defences must be kept up.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Kamhont has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Third Assault
The enemy forces are appearing weak and ragged. Their numbers are dwindling.
Fourth Assault
For Bree to be a free town once more, Goilag, the leader of the brigands, must be defeated.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A roar from the west echoes through the courtyard</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The voice calls out, 'Now bring it to the door!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Southpaw has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'Rest for a moment and gather your breath while we have the chance.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Growling sounds come from the south</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Banosn√°kh has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Defence of The Prancing Pony
<rgb=#FF0000>Flames lick from The Prancing Pony as the first brigand sets it to the torch</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Fires dance through the north wing of The Prancing Pony as another brigand sets it to the torch</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The north wing of The Prancing Pony is engulfed in flame as another brigand sets it to the torch</rgb>
